title: Control of electrical installation
fullText:
The supply to the electrical installation in a relocatable unit shall be controlled on the main switchboard by a main switch or switches that control the whole of the electrical installation in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
Where there is only one final subcircuit installed, the control of the electrical installation may be provided by the current limiting protection device required by Clause 4.5.3.
A combined RCD and overcurrent circuit-breaker (RCBO) complying with the requirements of AS/NZS 61009 may be used to satisfy this requirement.
